name: The Last Way Out
description:
Get out of this abandoned subway station filled with cops without getting caught.

A wanted criminal tries to reach the city docks to escape the country, but he has to go through an abandoned subway station full of cops.

He can't be seen by the cops, otherwise he'll get shot on sight. The fugitive will have to move in the dark and avoid the police lights. He can also take cover and hide in closets to survive.
